Room.Name: Myrr Lane
Room.ShortDescription: This is Myrr Lane which runs along the southern side of Lake Kista.
Room.LongDescription: Lake Kista is directly north of the city and Myrr Lane runs along its southern shore. There are several small homes, shops and buildings between you and the lake's edge. Farther to the east or west you will find Lake View Drive, which completely encircles the alpine lake. On the south side of the lane is a wall which surrounds the Great Observatory.
